price: 72. Qofkii ku indha la’ tani (adduunka oo xaqa ka beyra), wuxuu ahaan mid indha la’ Aakhirada, oo ka sii habowsan Jidka.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman kāna fī hādhihi aʿmā fahuwa fī al-ākhirati aʿmā wa-aḍallu sabīlan
